title: Bessent says White House may 'veto' Federal Reserve presidents
description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent plans to mandate that Federal Reserve regional bank presidents reside in their districts for three years prior to assuming office. This move aims to increase White House influence over the independent agency. Bessent believes …
content: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said Wednesday he would push a new requirement that the Federal Reserve's regional bank presidents live in their districts for at least three years before taking offi… [+2106 chars]
